eu.linksmart.caf.cm.util
Class ContextBuilderFactory

java.lang.Object
  eu.linksmart.caf.cm.util.ContextBuilderFactory

public class ContextBuilderFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class for building ContextSpecifications and QuerySets from various sources.
